data.title: 7 Best Games Like Minecraft 2023 On IOS And Android
data.description: Explore, create, and survive in these amazing games like Minecraft. They offer endless possibilities, stunning graphics, and multiplayer modes.
data.content:
Hey there, young gamers! Do you love playing Minecraft and want to try some other cool games that are just as fun? Well, you’re in for a treat! We’ve got a list of 7 awesome and free games that you can play on your phone or tablet, just like Minecraft. So get ready to explore, build, and have a blast with these fantastic games!

 

Craftsman: Building Craft

{app}{"id":"4665","name":"Craftsman: Building Craft","img":"/Uploads/articles/20231215/ea0f9db39d873efb03fa43c9ac1ee489.jpeg"}{/app}

Craftsman: Building Craft is a super cool game that’s a lot like Minecraft, but with even more possibilities! In this game, you become the ultimate craftsman, and the whole world is your playground. You can let your imagination run wild and build amazing wonders with blocks. Remember, the only limit in this game is your imagination. So go ahead, little builders, and create a world that’s uniquely yours!

 

Minetest

{app}{"id":"4666","name":"Minetest","img":"/Uploads/articles/20231215/e15a39e3c449eb04ab8c11b0c389f59b.jpeg"}{/app}

Minetest is a fantastic game where you can let your imagination soar! In this blocky world, you have the power to create anything you can dream of. Just like in Minecraft, the possibilities are endless! You can explore a massive virtual world, mine for cool stuff, and build all sorts of cool things using different blocks. What’s even cooler is that you can change the game and make it your own because it’s open-source!

 

Block Craft 3D

{app}{"id":"3999","name":"Block Craft 3D","img":"/Uploads/articles/20231215/fa0745500b14d0af49113feeed283c33.jpeg"}{/app}

Block Craft 3D is a game where you can create your own city from scratch! How awesome is that? Use your creativity to design buildings and make your city unique. It’s not just about building; you also get to manage your city, which makes it even more fun!

 

WorldCraft: 3D Block Craft

{app}{"id":"4667","name":"WorldCraft: 3D Block Craft","img":"/Uploads/articles/20231215/90a61fb55419679eb2dc8bfa32a47788.png"}{/app}

WorldCraft: 3D Block Craft is an awesome game where you can go on exciting adventures. Explore a big world, find hidden secrets, and complete fun quests! And just like in Minecraft, you can build fantastic structures too. It’s like having two games in one!

 

Roblox

{app}{"id":"3963","name":"ROBLOX","img":"/Uploads/articles/20231215/9bb7ae81b54e840b8cacbfcd16f719ce.jpeg"}{/app}

Roblox is a super popular game with tons of fun stuff to do. You can play games created by other players or even make your own games and share them with friends! It’s a friendly and social place where you can be creative and have a blast.

 

Terraria

{app}{"id":"4669","name":"Terraria","img":"/Uploads/articles/20231215/1c98ed93774e71832f965719e20df9a9.jpeg"}{/app}

Terraria is a 2D Sandbox game with gameplay that revolves around exploration, building, crafting, combat, survival, mining, and completing quests as well as defeating bosses and other monstrous creatures, playable in both single-player and multiplayer modes. The game has a 2D sprite tile-based graphical style reminiscent of the 16-bit sprites found on the Super NES.

 

LostMiner

{app}{"id":"4668","name":"LostMiner: Build & Craft Game","img":"/Uploads/articles/20231215/00247ae8abc937d5d89a532bb9ad0db2.jpeg"}{/app}

Similar to Terraria, LostMiner is a game where you can build, mine, and craft in a 2D world. As you play, you might also come across enemies, animals, and other things. The graphics are simple but charming, and match the game’s aesthetic.

 

Minecraft is an incredible game, and it’s natural to want to try something similar. That’s why we’ve shared these fantastic free games for you to enjoy on your phone or tablet. From Craftsman: Building Craft to Roblox, you can explore, create, and have loads of fun.

 

FAQs

Can I play with my friends in these games?

Yes, many of these games allow you to play with your friends, and some even let you make new friends while playing!

 

Are these games safe for me to play?

Absolutely! All the games mentioned here are kid-friendly and designed just for kids like you.

 

Do I need the internet to play these games?

Some games may need an internet connection, especially if you want to play with others online. But you can also enjoy some parts of the games offline.

 

Can I get cool stuff in these games without paying real money?

Yes, you can have lots of fun and build amazing things without spending any real money. Some games may offer optional stuff to buy, but you don’t need to buy them to have a great time!

 

Can I build anything I want in these games?

Absolutely! In these games, you are the boss of your creations. You can build whatever you imagine, from simple houses to gigantic castles! So go ahead and let your creativity shine!

app_info.name: Craftsman: Building Craft
app_info.seo_description: Craftsman is a creative app that empowers users to design and customize various crafts, from woodworking to digital art, enabling endless artistic exploration.
app_info.seo_keywords: Craftsman, crafts, design, creativity, woodworking, customization

app_info.name: Minetest
app_info.seo_description: Minetest is an open-source voxel game engine, allowing users to create and explore endless worlds. Perfect for crafting, building, and adventure in multiplayer mode.
app_info.seo_keywords: Minetest, voxel game, open-source, multiplayer, crafting, building

app_info.name: Block Craft 3D
app_info.seo_description: Create and explore your own 3D world in Block Craft 3D! Build amazing structures, craft unique items, and interact with friends in this interactive sandbox game.
app_info.seo_keywords: Block Craft 3D, sandbox, building, crafting, multiplayer, exploration

data.title: 8 Awesome Games Like Candy Crush Saga That You Can Play Right Now
data.description: Craving for some sweet and colorful puzzles? These games are just like Candy Crush Saga, but even more fun and challenging.
data.content:
If you love Candy Crush Saga, you might be looking for some other games that can offer you the same kind of fun and challenge. Here are some of the best games like Candy Crush Saga that you can download and play right now on your mobile devices or PC.

 

1. Farm Heroes Saga

This is another game from the makers of Candy Crush Saga, but with a twist. Instead of matching candies, you have to match fruits and vegetables to help the Farm Heroes stop the evil Rancid the Raccoon from spoiling the farm lands. The game features hundreds of levels, cute characters, and various boosters to help you along the way.

{app}{"id":"3739","name":"Farm Heroes Saga","img":"/Uploads/jq/articles/20231208/4e34c06edea1e423a92175877b8dc934.jpeg"}{/app}

 

2. Juice Cubes

This is a tropical-themed game where you have to match colorful cubes of fruit to create juicy explosions. You can also connect cubes to create powerful combos and clear obstacles. The game has over 550 levels, island hopping adventures, and online leaderboards to compete with your friends.

{app}{"id":"4638","name":"Juice cube: Match 3 Fruit Game","img":"/Uploads/jq/articles/20231208/5025a032ce4aceae86b1548388bad22e.jpeg"}{/app}

 

3. Candy Blast Mania

This is a game where you have to match and collect candies to defeat the evil Gummy Bear King and his cronies. You can also use special candies and power-ups to create big blasts and clear the board. The game has over 800 levels, various game modes, and daily events to keep you entertained.

{app}{"id":"4639","name":"Candy Blast Mania","img":"/Uploads/jq/articles/20231208/47b0ff13dea73da3c2876becc616e5c9.jpeg"}{/app}

 

4. Bejeweled Blitz

This is a classic game where you have to match three or more gems of the same color to score points and create cascades. You only have 60 seconds to make as many matches as you can and boost your score with special gems and power-ups. The game also has a social aspect, where you can challenge your friends and see their scores on the leaderboard.

{app}{"id":"4640","name":"Bejeweled Blitz","img":"/Uploads/jq/articles/20231208/29de67608255a10e25ea9f0c8491ab3c.png"}{/app}

 

5. Jewel Mania

This is a game where you have to swap and match jewels to complete the level objectives and unlock new worlds. You can also use special jewels and power-ups to create spectacular effects and overcome challenges. The game has over 600 levels, colorful graphics, and fun sound effects.

{app}{"id":"4641","name":"Jewel Mania™","img":"/Uploads/jq/articles/20231208/a3c3fca611db57522364b194db7c490f.jpeg"}{/app}

 

6. Juice Jam

This is a game where you have to match three or more fruits to make delicious smoothies for your customers. You can also use boosters and power-ups to create fruity explosions and satisfy your customers’ orders. The game has hundreds of levels, cute characters, and a variety of game modes.

{app}{"id":"4642","name":"Juice Jam - Match 3 Games","img":"/Uploads/jq/articles/20231208/31b776a9d660ae3c5d663607ba7073a1.jpeg"}{/app}

 

7. Book of Life: Sugar Smash

This is a game based on the animated movie The Book of Life, where you have to match sugar candies and swap them to collect them. You can also use special candies and power-ups to create sweet combos and clear the board. The game has over 300 levels, stunning graphics, and original music from the movie.

{app}{"id":"4643","name":"Sugar Smash: Book of Life","img":"/Uploads/jq/articles/20231208/cef4b6c1dda080df533b4f7f4aa501ca.png"}{/app}

 

8. Zookeeper Battle

This is a game where you have to match animal icons to attack your opponent and defend yourself. You can also use special items and skills to gain an edge in the battle. The game is a head-to-head battler, where you can challenge players from around the world and climb the rankings. The game has cute graphics, simple controls, and addictive gameplay.

{app}{"id":"4644","name":"ZOOKEEPER BATTLE","img":"/Uploads/jq/articles/20231208/c5462da619a345db50398651340d5c34.jpeg"}{/app}

 

Please enjoy~ðŸ˜Š

app_info.seo_keywords: Farm Heroes Saga, puzzle game, match-3, farming, adventure, crop collection

app_info.name: Candy Blast Mania

app_info.seo_keywords: Candy Blast Mania, puzzle game, match candies, colorful, fun challenges, addictive gameplay

data.title: Top 8 Best Offline Android Games in 2022
data.description: No internet? No problem. These games will keep you entertained without any data or Wi-Fi. They are fun, challenging, and addictive.

app_info.name: Alto's Odyssey
app_info.seo_description: Embark on a breathtaking journey in Alto's Odyssey, where you traverse stunning landscapes, overcome dynamic obstacles, and collect treasures while snowboarding. Join friends for endless adventures!
app_info.seo_keywords: Alto's Odyssey, endless runner, adventure game, beautiful landscapes, snowboarding, multiplayer

app_info.name: Monument Valley 2
app_info.seo_description: Embark on a mesmerizing journey through stunning landscapes and optical illusions in Monument Valley 2, a beautifully crafted puzzle game with a touching narrative.
app_info.seo_keywords: Monument Valley 2, puzzle, adventure, illusion, narrative, gaming

app_info.name: Sea Battle 2
app_info.seo_description: Engage in strategic naval warfare in Sea Battle 2! Compete with friends or players worldwide, deploy your fleet, and outsmart your opponents in thrilling battles.
app_info.seo_keywords: Sea Battle 2, naval warfare, strategy game, multiplayer, battleship, tactical
